channel.title: Retrieve One :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: Retrieve One Route Many RESTful web APIs also include the ability to retrieve a single object from a collection by providing the ID as a parameter to the route. So, let’s go ahead and build that route in our application as well. Unused in Practice While this route is an important part of many RESTful web APIs, it can often go unused since most frontend web applications will simply use the retrieve all endpoint to get a list of items, and then it will just cache that result and filter the list to show a user a single entry. However, there are some use cases where this route is extremely useful, so we’ll go ahead and include it in our backend code anyway.
